Главная.Описание: The "Supply Chain Management" scientific journal has been published since 2023. The founder (publisher) of the journal is the Kazakh-German University. The journal is published quarterly (4 issues per year).

О журнале.Описание: The "Supply Chain Management" scientific journal has been published since 2023. The founder (publisher) of the journal is the Kazakh-German University. The journal is published quarterly (4 issues per year).
О журнале.информирование научной общественности по: informing the scientific community about fundamental and applied research,
О журнале.содействие развитию научных исследований: facilitating the development of scientific research through highlighting the scientific work of specialists in the fields covered by the Journal's theme
О журнале.привлечение внимания ученых и специалист: attracting the attention of scientists and specialists to its issues
О журнале.публикация оригинальных научных статей и: publication of original scientific articles and reviews
О журнале.отражение основных результатов научно-ис: reflecting the main results of scientific research and experimental design work
О журнале.пропаганда основных достижений науки;: promoting the main achievements of science
О журнале.обеспечение эффективной научно-исследова: ensuring effective scientific research activities at the university
О журнале.формирование научного сообщества, объеди: forming a scientific community united by the theme of the journal
О журнале.Основными целями издания научного журнал: The main goals of publishing the "Supply Chain Management" scientific journal are
О журнале.Журнал издается для решения следующих за: The journal is published to solve the following tasks

Правила оформления статей.Материал статьи – текст, включая аннотац: Article material - text, including annotations in Kazakh, Russian, and English, reference list, figures, captions to figures and tables, should be formatted in a single file in *.RTF or *.DOCX formats, saved in Microsoft Word version no earlier than 2013 due to differences in Microsoft Word versions that may cause the problem of missing spaces between words. Files saved in other formats are not accepted.
Правила оформления статей.Структура статьи строится строго в следу: The structure of the article is strictly arranged in the following order:
Правила оформления статей.Информация об авторах, включая, фамилию,: Information about authors, including the surname, first name, and patronymic of each author - in full, academic degree, position, place of work/study, email address in Russian, Kazakh, and English.
Правила оформления статей.Название статьи – по центру, жирными и п: Article title - centered, in bold and uppercase letters
Правила оформления статей.Полный текст статьи, соответствующий меж: The full text of the article, corresponding to the international IMRAD formula (formatted in the language of the article).
Правила оформления статей.Список использованной литературы в строг: The list of used literature in strict numerical order in the language of the article and common English transliteration with the translation of the titles of literary sources into English.
Правила оформления статей.Полный текст рукописи объемом 6-8 (не бо: The full text of the manuscript of 6-8 (no more than 15) pages, including article components: reference lists in the original language and in Latin script, annotations, and keywords in the language of the manuscript and in English translation, fully formatted according to the requirements in Word and PDF environments.
Правила оформления статей.Сведения об авторах на казахском, русско: Information about authors in Kazakh, Russian, and English. For foreign authors in English.
Правила оформления статей.На отдельной странице после статьи:: On a separate page after the article:
Правила оформления статей.Контакты авторов: ФИО – мобильный, рабоч: Authors' contacts: Full name - mobile, work, and home phones, email address, full postal address (for payment for mailing).
Правила оформления статей.Контакты автора, от имени которого будет: Contact details of the author who will make the payment: Surname and initials, TIN, mobile, work and home phones, e-mail, full postal address with zip code (for contract preparation).
Правила оформления статей.Название статьи, ИО Фамилия авторов – ст: Title of the article, initials and surname of the authors - in lowercase letters in three languages (Eng, Rus, Kaz).

Правила для читателей.Мы приглашаем вас подписаться на уведомл: We invite you to subscribe to our journal notifications by signing up to receive notifications of each new issue. Simply click the REGISTRATION link located at the top of the journal's main page to complete the registration process.
Правила для читателей.Зарегистрировавшись, вы будете получать: By registering, you will receive the contents of each new issue directly to your email, keeping you up to date with the latest research, articles, and events in our field. Your registration also plays an important role in supporting the journal and contributes to our growing community of interested readers.
Правила для читателей.Мы ценим вашу конфиденциальность, и вы м: We value your privacy, and you can be assured that your name and email address will be used exclusively for the distribution of journal updates. We have a Privacy Statement page where you can learn more about how we handle your information and ensure it is not used for any other purposes.
Правила для читателей.Спасибо, что стали частью нашего сообщес: Thank you for becoming part of our community. We look forward to keeping you informed and engaged with the valuable content of our journal.

Правила для авторов.Редакция научного журнала: The editorial board of the scientific journal considers only previously unpublished author materials - scientific articles, review articles, corresponding to the journal's theme in Kazakh, Russian, and English languages. The article should contain the results of original scientific research and practical work on current problems in the fields that correspond to the journal's theme. The manuscript should be formatted according to the Article Formatting Guidelines.
Правила для авторов.Обращаем ваше внимание: Please note that the author is responsible for the accuracy of citations, facts, statistical data, proper names, and other information, as well as for the content of materials not subject to open publication. Articles containing elements of plagiarism and any other unauthorized use of intellectual property objects are not published in the journal.
Правила для авторов.Автор не должен предлагать свою статью д: The author should not offer their article to other journals and publications if it has been accepted by the editorial board.
Правила для авторов.Оформленная по Правилам: The electronically formatted version of the manuscript is accepted through the website https://logscm.kz/ by clicking the "SUBMIT ARTICLE" button by one of the authors. The article should have no more than 5 authors

Отправка статьи.Этот автор является главным: This author is the corresponding author
Отправка статьи.Нажмите или перетащите файл в эту област: Click or drag a file to this area
Отправка статьи.Я принимаю согласие на обработку персона: I consent to the processing of personal data
Отправка статьи.Я подтверждаю, что моя статья является о: I confirm that my article is an original work and does not infringe upon others' copyright
Отправка статьи.Поддержка одновременной загрузки несколь: Support for uploading multiple files simultaneously
Отправка статьи.Спасибо вам за вашу заявку, она была под: Thank you for your submission, it has been sent for review.
Отправка статьи.После завершения рецензии вам на почту п: After the review is complete, you will receive an email with its results
